name: Steven Rodriguez
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hello and Happy Holidays my name is Steven and I am 28 years old, I currently drive as a delivery driver for door dash in which my people skills and timely manners would be great for high energy and quite a leader. I am pretty simple guy I like the outdoors,sports,foodie, and etc. Get to know me and by all means it will be friends for life. Go ahead and give me a call and a have a great day.
